scripts.build: vite build --config vite.config.ts && esbuild server/index.ts --platform=node --packages=external --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --define:import.meta.dirname=__dirname --banner:js='import { fileURLToPath } from "url"; import { dirname } from "path"; const __filename = fileURLToPath(import.meta.url); const __dirname = dirname(__filename);'
